UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below 50% of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

UNIQUE Passive - Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Pauldrons of Whiterock, increasing the Ward active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

UNIQUE Active - Ward: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area. Holds up to 3 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.
